oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Abner Clint Lyles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crayon print of Abner Clint Lyles, born February 18, 1845 Roane County (Tenn.) and died June 2, 1924. Morgan (Tenn." This post-war image shows Lyles with a drum, which is also a post-war model.; According to family lore he was a drummer boy in the Union Army.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lyles, Abner Clint
